content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `keep_only_names` which iterates over the provided list of words (`words`) and removes all words that do not start with a capital letter (eg, remove "dog" but keep "Dog").

Here is how you can write this function in Julia.

```julia
function keep_only_names(words) 
    return [word for word in words if isupper(first(word))]
end
```
The `isupper` function checks whether the first character of a string (`first(word)`) is an uppercase letter. The returned list comprehension includes only those words that pass this test, effectively filtering out any word that does not start with a capital letter.
